name: 'Tangle
description:
'Tangle is a small puzzle game created by myself, Dmitri Klassen, and is my first game. It has 22 levels of increasing difficulty and may take anywhere from a few minutes to a few hours depending on how quickly you master the game's mechanics. Give it a go and tell me what you think! All feedback is appreciated.

The controls are W, A, and D to move, space bar to teleport, R to restart a level, and Alt + Tab to full-screen.
